attributes.action: Advise the USA to stop taking military strikes on a the sovereign state of Pakistan which is an infringement of international law and also it may destabilise the region
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent attacks by USA military on Pakistan and called it a serious infringement of international law and attack on a sovereign nation. These attacks would be seen by the people of Pakistan,  all law abiding internatonational citizens of the world and all democratic countries as an attempt to destabilise Pakistan and its democratic government which could send the whole region in to anarchy and the effects would be seen all over the world. demands.  We praise FM Millibands recent stance on the regional issue and hoped for a major policy shift from the new Democratic Pakistani Government.
